name: PHATMAN
description:
STORY

Phatman is a hero with obesity-based powers who battles adversaries opposed to his size and way of life.

Set in the near future- in which obesity has been outlawed- Phatman stands alone against a variety of foes who would seek to destroy him and his kind. 

GAMEPLAY

PHATMAN is a platformer similar in style to SNES platformers like Super Mario and Donkey Kong, with elements of early Sonic the Hedgehog thrown in. 

Players can gut punch, fart jump, roll, and shoot missile-like poos at foes as they battle through the level.

Players need to collect a variety of pick-ups such as: pizza for health; toilet paper to increase the poo-meter; and the letters that form the word ‘PHAT’ to gain an additional life.

CONTROLS

Left Arrow Key: Move Left

Right Arrow Key: Move Right

Enter: Pause & Navigate Main Menu

Z: Fart Jump (Normal Jump)

Z + Z: Double Fart Jump (Double Jump)

X: Gut Punch

C: Poo Missile

Up + Z:  Belly Bounce (Mega Jump)

Down + Z:  Spin Dash

TIPS

  • Look for black outlines- they are the parts that need to be navigated
  • Collect ‘PHAT’ to gain an extra life
  • Use poos sparingly- the poo meter depletes rapidly
  • Toilet paper 'refills' the poo meter
  • Pizza restores health
  • Other food items score points
